comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The picture shows the only example built of the Friedrichshafen D.I single seat fighter with serial D 2405/16 on the side of the fuselage. This only sample was acquired by the Fliegertruppe and hence got the official identity D.I. The machine had the factory identification FF 46 where FF stood for Flugzeugbau Friedrichshafen.
